transcript:
Agent: Hello, is this Mr. Johnson?
Customer: Yes, it is. Who's calling?
Agent: My name is Emily, and I'm calling from GreenTech Solutions. We specialize in energy-efficient lighting systems.
Customer: Okay, I've heard of you. What can you do for me?
Agent: We've recently launched a new line of LED bulbs that can help reduce your energy consumption by up to 50%.
Customer: That sounds interesting. I've been looking to cut down my electricity bill.
Agent: Exactly! Our bulbs are not only environmentally friendly but also cost-effective in the long run.
Customer: How much do they cost?
Agent: Our starter pack, which includes 10 bulbs, is priced at $50.
Customer: That's a bit steep for me. Do you have any discounts or promotions?
Agent: Actually, we're running a special offer this month. If you purchase the starter pack, you'll get 10% off your first order.
Customer: That sounds better. Can you tell me more about the warranty and support?
Agent: Our bulbs come with a 5-year warranty, and we offer dedicated customer support 24/7.
Customer: Okay, I think I'm interested. Can you send me a link to place the order online?
Agent: Absolutely, I'll send you an email with the link and the discount code. Would you like me to follow up with you tomorrow to confirm the order?
Customer: Yes, that would be great. Thank you, Emily.
Agent: You're welcome, Mr. Johnson. I'll talk to you tomorrow then.
Customer: Looking forward to it. Bye.
Agent: Bye, have a great day!
